documents.document: This is my first 280 character tweet... What to say with all of new space and room for lots of words... Hmmm... The last week has been crazy but I am grateful to have so many awesome people in my life and now things are looking up! #WednesdayWisdom jeez still more room...
@BigNicJoh OMG LOL I love Oscar the Grouch... anything dirty or dingy or dusty... I loooove trash! I remember that song
@SteveRudden I do, but I only really watch a few stories. I am not on it very much. I check up on my daughter and a few friends who keep it interesting.
First car mat skirts, now this. Who would actually wear this? https://t.co/RcevTQnMVC
@SteveRudden I liked using it actually but it drains my battery so bad I stopped.
If you could be friends with one celeb, who would it be? I'd pick Jennifer Garner & her pet chicken, Regina George. https://t.co/uzWntlTsKU
Now playing 60 MINUTES of NON-STOP MUSIC on @947FreshFM.. Are you listening at work? Let me know!
Want to see @U2 in #DC and then MEET THEM in #NYC? Listen to @947FreshFM at 12:50pm to win tix & qualify for trip to album listening party!
@comfortme_u2 Crazy, right? Who gets to meet Bono??
Want to meet Bono? Listen to @947FreshFM at 12:50pm & win tix to the @U2 show in June, qualify to meet them in NYC! #U2 #Bono
@VioletFeline Because texting while driving isn't distracting enough.
.@NBCThisisUs @themandymoore @ChrissyMetz Is it true you are wearing @LuLaRoe clothes in new episodes? That's what CEO says.
